CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 25, 1956, pg. A21, reads: "Sparkle at Tea - These young ladies are contemplating the AKA Cotillion. They were entertained at a tea last Sunday afternoon at the Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity House.  A 'Finishing Course in Social Graces' was introduced also.  Pictured, from left to right, are 'Connie' Harris, LaVerne Waddy, Marcia Hill, Yolanda Harris, Bernice Velar, Sylvia Harris, Patricia Gloster and Joanne Scales. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of eight women, including Connie Harris, LaVerne Waddy, Marcia Hill, Yolanda Harris, Bernice Velar, Sylvia Harris, Patricia Gloster, and Joanne Scales, posed on stairs in Alpha Phi Alpha Fraternity house
